name: INTERPLANETARY (itch) (SENNNNSE)
description:
A swing move 10 times on Earth  only moves 2 times On the Moon. On every planet, every 10 seconds differs

“Interplanetary” is a strategic management game where you can place cards in order to obtain resources for survival.

Introduction: 

Each planet has a different time flow and cards are randomly generated every 10s in their own time zone. Ice, plant, and animal cards generate new resources every 10s(of the planet), and new cards can be obtained by combining them or eliminating them.
– Put “Chicken”, “Cooow”, “apple” and “Egg” cards onto the “POT” will replenish the food value.

– Put ”Water” and “Milk” cards onto the “Water Dispenser” to replenish the water value,

– and dragging the “Oxygen” cards to the “Oxygen feeder” will replenish the Oxygen value.

Press [A] and [D] to move between planets.

The game will end when the food value, water value and oxygen value overflow or go to zero, and when there is no space in the deck.

[Dirt + Water = Grass]

[Dirt + Dirt + Water = Tree]

[Chiken] + {Grass} = [Chicken} x2

{Cooow] + [Grass] = [Cooow] x2

[Ice] >> [Water]
